solution_line_template: Henry gets paid {paint_payment} + {sell_payment} = $<<{paint_payment}+{sell_payment}={total_per_bike}>>{total_per_bike} for each bike painted and sold.
In total, Henry will be paid {num_bikes} * {total_per_bike} = $<<{num_bikes}*{total_per_bike}={total_paid}>>{total_paid} for painting and selling {num_bikes} bikes.
